CIRCULAR 3/2000 
 
SUB : GUARDING OF VITAL INSTALLATIONS AT AIRPORT 
 
1. 
It has been brought to our notice that the Terminal Building / operational Areas of 
domestic sector at the Civil Airports in India are not guarded by armed guards of the 
concerned state / U T Police.  Under the current surcharged atmosphere in the country and 
threat to aviation target from terrorist outfits in the country, it is a matter of paramount 
importance that airports should not be left unguarded.  Sabotage activities by miscreants / 
terrorists in the airports to cause unlawful interference with civil aviation operations cannot 
be ruled out.  It has, therefore, been decided that the terminal buildings and vital installations 
like ATC; armed guards should guard VOR etc. 
 
2. 
It is requested that necessary directions to the concerned SSPs may please be issued to 
deploy armed guards for protection of the airports in your jurisdiction. 
 
(VEERANNA AIVALLI) 
COMMISSIONER OF SECURITY (CA) 
 
NO.CAS-3(1)/2000-DIV-I 
Dated : 14.01.2000
